ctx: intros x n m Hneq Hsorted.

original: intros x n m Hneq Hsorted. induction x. -- simpl. split; auto. -- simpl. destruct (inf_egal n a) eqn:E. ++ simpl. split. ** apply sorted_inf with a x. apply Hsorted. ** apply sorted_eq3. split. --- rewrite E. reflexivity. --- destruct Hsorted as [_ Hrest]. apply Hrest. ++ simpl. split. ** rewrite inf_false_true. destruct Hsorted as [Hna _]. apply Hna. apply Hneq. ** apply IHx. apply sorted_cdr with a. apply Hsorted.
